TopicTitle: Time warp dependent on whatever entity has the highest allowable warp regardless of perspective

Articles.Content:
I don't know if this is an intended feature for early access but as the title reads; this is a little annoying.

Currently, if you only have one active craft that is parked in a low orbit that doesn't allow for reasonable time warps (e.g. interplanetary transfers) you need a probe with a higher orbit to whatever it is orbiting to allow for a bigger time warp.

Edited March 7, 2023 by jaggaaff_
